string.text: All team members must be present
Map not available for this area
New concept artwork available in the review library.
New comic edition available in the review library.
This mission has a limited number of heroes. Additional players will be in standby until more heroes become active.
Great job! Mission accomplished! But your work isn't done yet.
Your character has just leveled up!\nStat and skill improvements can be automatically distributed, or you may take control of this yourself
Outfit each character with beneficial equipment that will help enhance their abilities. Would you like equipment to be distributed automatically?
Press SELECT button to Level Up
You found a data disc!\n%d of %d data discs found.
Automatically spend stat and skill points
Leave all current hero settings alone
Leave all current hero settings alone
You found a red homing beacon!\n%d of %d red homing beacons found.
You found a yellow homing beacon!\n%d of %d yellow homing beacons found.
You found a blue homing beacon!\n%d of %d blue homing beacons found.
You found an orange homing beacon!\n%d of %d orange homing beacons found.
You found a green homing beacon!\n%d of %d green homing beacons found.
When one player gets separated from the others, use $SOLO + $POWER to regroup.
When one player gets separated from the others, pull $SOLO to regroup.
%s Must Not Be Defeated More Than %d Times
Compete against other players in various combat games.
Each Player - Choose a character for combat
Challengers must defeate five champions in sixty seconds!
You Have Achieved The Highest Score!

The Danger Room will be unlocked once you have reached level 6 in story mode.

You will only be able to use the Sparring mode at first.

Skirmish modes will begin unlocking at level 16.
Your current Danger Room session will end and its progress will be lost. Are you sure you wish to exit to the Danger Room menu?
Returning to Danger Room menu to setup another skirmish among remaining players.
Your session has ended and you will no longer be connected to the other players.
Skirmish mode requires at least two players
Skirmish mode requires all players to select a character to play
You have acquired a danger room disk that contains the course
Each is respawned when defeated. Players compete for most knock outs within a time limit. The player with most knock outs wins.
There is a single power boost on the map that allows the possessor to be the king using Xtreme powers. The player who is the king the longest wins.
Each player gets 4 lives and the last player alive wins the match.
Each player gets 4 lives. When a player is knocked out, they will respawn with increased power. The last player standing wins.
Challengers must defeat each champion 5 times.\nUse any combination you like, but only 4 story mode heroes can be activated at the same time.
Do not allow %d %ss to be defeated.
Call for help from allies %d times.
You failed to defend the civilians.
The danger level got too high.
You failed to protect the targets.
You cannot use Health or Energy items in either Sparring or Skirmish, and you will not earn any experience here. This is purely for practice and the right to call yourself the best.\n\n  Good Luck.
There are not enough targets remaining to execute the move.
Practice combat against enemies and allies alike.
View the records of previous sparring matches.
The disk which contains this training course has not yet been found. Once you find the disk, the computer will have it on file.
You are not high enough level to play this game type.
There are no unlocked characters for sparring.
There are no high scores recorded.
Single player Training courses are unavailable for Online play.
You are not high enough level for any Skirmish modes.
Do you wish to save your high scores? These are saved with your game options.

While you are away from the story, you may practice here. Your characters will not gain experience. Neither will you find any items to add to your inventory. Training is not available in this competitive Danger Room mode.
Here you may learn your enemies' strengths and weaknesses by fighting with or against them. Choose your challengers, choose your champions, and compete for a high score.

Here you may test your skills in combat against other players. Learn the limits of your powers, better understand your strengths as well as your weaknesses, and have fun with your friends.


There will be no health or energy items in this mode.
Your progress in this training course will be lost. Do you wish to continue?
You must complete these objectives to pass this course.
Abilities and powers may behave slightly differently when skirmishing here than when playing story mode.
Uses this power when controlled by AI and the ally button is pressed.
Your current game will end without saving. All unsaved progress will be lost. Are you sure you wish to exit to the main menu?
Reach into the grab bag and take your chances with what you will get.
New comics added to your collection have given the following permanent bonuses
Congratulations! \nYou have found all concept artwork. \nBonus Marvel artwork unlocked.
Purchase these disks to load danger room courses into the computer.
You cannot drop any more equipment here. Please move to a less crowded area.

Increases the damage you do with Melee attacks

~02Damage Bonus~~
+2%% per Striking

~02DMG~~
Regular Attack, Heavy Attack

Increases your Attack Rating ($AR) and Defense Rating ($DR)

~02Attack Rating~~
Increases the chance to hit with Melee attacks
5 per Speed - 35

~02Defense Rating~~
Increases your ability to dodge incoming Melee attacks
3 per Speed

Increases your health points ($HP) and chance for double health from potions.

~02Health~~
25 + 5 per Level + 3 per Body

~02Double Heal Chance :~~ ^%d%%

~02Energy Resistance~~ ($RES_ENERGY)
~02Mental Resistance~~ ($RES_MENTAL)
~02Radiation Resistance~~ ($RES_RADIATION)
~02Elemental Resistance~~ ($RES_ELEMENTAL)

Increases your energy points ($EP), energy regeneration, Melee $DMG_MENTAL, and chance for double energy from potions.

~02Energy~~
30 + 4 per Level + 2 per Focus

~02Energy Regeneration :~~ +^%d%%
~02Double Energy Chance :~~ ^%d%%
~02Damage Bonus :~~ +^%d%%
Complete these objectives for additional experience and potential reward
You have no objectives to accomplish yet
Stays away from enemies attacking only when attacked

When an AI teammate's health drops below this level, AI will automatically use health packs as long as there are more than 2 remaining.\n\nNOTE: This setting is synchronized for all story mode heroes.
Automatically spends stat points when a level is gained.
Automatically spends skill points when a level is gained.
Automatically distributes equipment between all active characters with this enabled when new equipment is obtained.

Indicates if potions will be used when you try to pickup another but cannot carry any more and still have some health to be gained. This helps to keep you from leaving health behind.\n\nNOTE: This setting is synchronized for all story mode heroes.

~02AI Skill~~\nThe skill slot that this hero will attempt to execute when you $PRESS $SOLO to call for help.\nIf there is a more appropriate skill for the range they are from the target, they may elect to use that instead.
You cannot drop equipment while unconscious.

%s has just learned a third attack power.\n\nWhile holding $POWER when playing, you can use $DPAD_UP to cycle what powers are assigned to any hero by pressing in the direction of the button you want to change.

%s has just learned a third attack power.\n\nWhile holding $POWER when playing, you can use $DPAD_UP to cycle what powers are assigned to any hero by pressing in the direction of the button you want to change.
Recovers 33% of max $EP with a chance for 66% based on Focus
Recovers 33% of max $HP with a chance for 66% based on Body
Advances character one level in experience
Gives character one extra skill point to distribute
Character skill points can be redistributed as desired
You have unlocked Professor X for use in story mode and the Danger Room!
Blink must rest before creating another targeted portal. Please wait until the Blink Portal timer expires.
Blink cannot create a targeted portal in this area.

%s has just learned a third attack power.\n\nWhile pulling and holding $POWER when playing, you can press $DPAD_UP to cycle what powers are assigned to any hero by pressing in the direction of the button you want to change.
Deadpool is now unlocked and available to play.
You must distribute all skill points before you train to the next level.
Wolverine must be a team member to activate the ice tunnel side-quest.
Wolverine must be a team member to activate the rooftop side-quest.\n
All team members have been eliminated.
An innocent bystander has been killed
An atmospheric generator has been destroyed.
SHIELD reinforcements have been shot down by the perimeter guns.
Are you sure you want to delete this game?
Insufficient space to create a new save. Select save file to overwrite.
Are you sure you wish to delete this save file?
The DUALSHOCK${R}2 analog controller is not detected. Please insert a DUALSHOCK${R}2 analog controller to controller port 1, and press the $MENU_ACCEPT button to continue.
The DUALSHOCK${R}2 analog controller is not detected. Please insert a DUALSHOCK${R}2 analog controller to controller port %s, and press the $MENU_ACCEPT button to continue.
Do you want to exit this zone?
Choose a saved game to load character statistics from, or use the default character statistics.
Choose a saved game to load character statistics from.
There's a problem with the disc you're using. It may be dirty or damaged.
Loading data. Do not remove memory card (PS2) in MEMORY CARD slot %s, controller, or reset/switch off the console.
Do you want to save options to hard disk?

Unable to load settings. Data is corrupted. Continue without loading?
No Memory Stick Duoâ„¢ inserted. At least %d KB is needed to save this game data. An additional %d KB is needed to save game options. Continue without saving?
There is insufficient space on the Memory Stick Duoâ„¢. At least %d KB is needed to save this game data. Continue without saving?
There is insufficient space on the Memory Stick Duoâ„¢. At least %d KB is needed to save this game data. An additional %d KB is needed to save game options. Continue without saving?
There is insufficient space on the Memory Stick Duoâ„¢. At least %d KB is needed to save game options. Do you wish to delete data to make room?
Contains game settings in addition to unlocked characters and items.
Do you want to save unlocked features to the Memory Stick Duo$TM?
Do you want to save unlocked features to the Memory Stick Duoâ„¢?
A network error has occurred. \nPress $MENU_ACCEPT to return to the main menu.
Comic missions can only be launched from in game
Do you want to save options to the Memory Stick Duo$TM?
Network connection has been lost: reverting to the main menu.
A network error occurred. Do you want to continue to play the game in single-player mode? Selecting 'No' will return you to the Main Menu.
You must turn the WLAN switch on for multiplayer games.
At least two players are required to play an online game.
A network error occurred because the WLAN switch is off. Do you want to continue to play the game in single-player mode? Selecting 'No' will return you to the Main Menu.
